Articles.Content:
Hello, and I'm currently writing a plugin, which enables 1-way animated engines, like the RL-10-B2 or the M-1. I want to know the animation state for "Deployed". Also, I would like the engine to not be able to activate if the animation is in progress, or if it hasn't started yet. Could someone please find the animation state for "Deployed"?

Thanks, Bottle Rocketeer

Edited August 30, 2017 by Bottle Rocketeer 500

There is  no animation state for "deployed". There is only an animation range going from 0 to 1 with a essentially is from zero to one hundred percent animated. Depending on how you set it up will depend on which is deployed and which is not.

Take a look at the retractable lifting Wing mod to get some ideas as to how to do it.

9 minutes ago, linuxgurugamer said:

There is  no animation state for "deployed". There is only an animation range going from 0 to 1 with a essentially is from zero to one hundred percent animated. Depending on how you set it up will depend on which is deployed and which is not.

Take a look at the retractable lifting Wing mod to get some ideas as to how to do it.

Thanks, I was looking for 100% animated, as my plugin makes the animation only 1-way.
You do the one way control in your code
